System Requirements

Supported Development Environments

  • GNU gcc 4.4.7 or higher
  • Microsoft Visual Studio 2019
  • Microsoft Visual Studio 2022
Note
We are using the Red Hat Developer Toolset for builds with non-standard GCC versions on Red Hat. Therefore, we recommend using DTS as a modern and easy-to-use way, which does not affect the system GCC version and tools.

Deployment Environments

  • Linux (kernel 2.6)
  • Microsoft Windows
